scenes.name: Introduction
scenes.description: Welcome and overview of what the product does
scenes.transcription: Welcome to our product demo. Today I'll show you how our solution can transform your workflow.

scenes.name: Key Features Overview
scenes.description: High-level overview of the main features
scenes.transcription: Our product has three main features: automation, analytics, and integrations. Let me walk you through each one.

scenes.name: Automation Demo
scenes.transcription: The automation feature lets you create workflows that run automatically. Here's how you set it up...

scenes.name: Analytics Dashboard
scenes.description: Tour of the analytics and reporting features
scenes.transcription: Our analytics dashboard gives you real-time insights into your data. You can see metrics, create reports, and export everything.

scenes.name: Integration Setup
scenes.description: How to connect with other tools and services
scenes.transcription: We integrate with over 100 tools. Let me show you how easy it is to connect your existing tools.

scenes.name: Pricing Plans
scenes.description: Overview of pricing tiers and what's included
scenes.transcription: We offer three pricing tiers: Starter, Professional, and Enterprise. Each tier includes different features...

scenes.name: Customer Success Story
scenes.transcription: One of our customers, Acme Corp, increased their productivity by 40% after implementing our solution.

scenes.name: Getting Started
scenes.description: Quick start guide for new users
scenes.transcription: Getting started is easy. Just sign up, connect your first integration, and you're ready to go in minutes.

scenes.name: Advanced Features
scenes.transcription: For power users, we offer advanced features like custom scripting, API access, and white-labeling options.

scenes.name: Summary & Next Steps
scenes.description: Wrap up and call to action
scenes.transcription: That's our product in a nutshell. Ready to get started? Sign up for a free trial or schedule a demo with our team.
